csdl.jupiter.ui.action
Class ReviewAdditionActionDelegate

java.lang.Object
  csdl.jupiter.ui.action.ReviewAdditionActionDelegate
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.ui.IActionDelegate, org.eclipse.ui.IEditorActionDelegate
public class ReviewAdditionActionDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.ui.IEditorActionDelegate

Provides an action triggered when Code Review pop up menu on the Compilation Unit is selected. Do the action that the code review editor is opened to edit comments with class name, method name, and line number if applicable.

Version:
$Id: ReviewAdditionActionDelegate.java,v 1.26 2005/03/28 14:39:31 takuyay Exp $
Author:
Takuya Yamashita

Method Detail

run

public void run(org.eclipse.jface.action.IAction action)
Runs logic implementation when the menu, whose this implementing target is defined in the plugin.xml, is selected. See the plugin.xml file. Clients should not call this method.

Specified by:
run in interface org.eclipse.ui.IActionDelegate
Parameters:
action - The action proxy that handles the presentation portion of the action
See Also:
IActionDelegate.run(org.eclipse.jface.action.IAction)

determineProjectReviewIdReviewerId

public static boolean determineProjectReviewIdReviewerId()
Processes opening review table and review editor. If the necessary value such as project, review id, reviewer id, phase name key are not set, prompt the proper dialog to let user specify these value before the open.

Returns:
true if the project, review id, and reviewer id, were determined.

getLineNumber

public java.lang.String getLineNumber()
Gets the line number of the active file if any.

Returns:
the line number of the active file if any.

selectionChanged

public void selectionChanged(org.eclipse.jface.action.IAction action,
                             org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection selection)
Notifies this action delegate that the selection in the workbench has changed. Gets a fully qualified class name, method name, line number if applicable. Clients should not call this method.

Specified by:
selectionChanged in interface org.eclipse.ui.IActionDelegate
See Also:
#selectionChanged(org.eclipse.jface.action.IAction, org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection)
